translation.en: and really focus on her comfort and her calmness,
translation.ja: 彼女の苦痛を和らげて― 家族と過ごせるようにする

translation.en: and her being with her family and let her pass naturally.
translation.ja: 家族と過ごせるようにする そして自然な形で見送るんです

translation.en: [sniffs] Knowing at some point you gotta get to that reality,
translation.ja: 現実と向き合う時が来ると知りつつも逃げてた

translation.en: you know, but you can always put it off, and now it's here.
translation.ja: 現実と向き合う時が来ると知りつつも逃げてた ついに来たか

translation.en: I can't tell if she is alert enough
translation.ja: ただ 私が不安なのは彼女がこの話を― 理解できるかどうかです

translation.en: to have this conversation.

translation.en: When I talked to her this morning a little bit,
translation.ja: 今朝 彼女と話した時―

translation.en: I didn't feel that she... was really understanding.
translation.ja: きちんと伝わってない感じがしました

translation.en: [stutters] And that's-- At that point, if that's the way it is,
translation.ja: きちんと伝わってない感じがしました そうなってしまったら…

translation.en: and if things don't... if she doesn't perk up and really become herself,
translation.ja: つまり自覚できなくなったら―

translation.en: that's when surrogate people have to step in and make those choices.
translation.ja: ご家族が決める必要があります

translation.en: [voice breaking] I wanna make sure that she knows that--
translation.ja: 手を尽くしたことを―

translation.en: that we've explored all the options.
translation.ja: 本人に分かってほしい

translation.en: I told her I'd never let the doctors stop. -Mmm-hmm. -[sniffs] I would never let 'em stop,
translation.ja: “治療をやめさせない”と彼女に言ったんです

translation.en: but when I told 'em to stop, she had to trust me.
translation.ja: “でも俺が決めたら信じろ”と

translation.en: [Dr. Bhargava] And I'm with you. I don't want her to suffer or have anything prolonged or painful.
translation.ja: 私も苦痛を長引かせない方がいいと思う

translation.en: I just want them to make a decision with the best information available.
translation.ja: でも 正確な判断材料をあげたいの

translation.en: And I feel that as of right now, as of today,
translation.ja: 例えば現時点では―

translation.en: we haven't had, you know, an expert in her disorder
translation.ja: まだこの病気の専門家の意見を聞いてない

translation.en: weigh in on what her prognosis might be.

translation.en: -My biggest-- But I was saying-- -My biggest fear is telling a family
translation.ja: “望みはない”と家族に伝えて―

translation.ja: “望みはない”と家族に伝えて― もし間違いだったら？

translation.en: I sat with that family for an hour and a half. -Yeah. -And I pulled every little bit of information about her
translation.ja: 家族と１時間半 話して患者のいろんなことを聞いた

translation.en: -Right. -and I found that she'd had conversations with her brother
translation.ja: 彼女は過去に何度も―

translation.en: that she had initiated several times -Yeah. -about not wanting to be on a machine, not wanting to be kept alive on machines.
translation.ja: “機械で延命するのは嫌”と兄弟に話していたそうよ

translation.en: Part of me is, like, death is so final that if we sort of...
translation.ja: でも死は取り返せない

translation.en: -I know. -If we make the decision not to go down that route...

translation.en: I know, I know.
translation.ja: ええ　分かってる

translation.en: And frankly, we're not even making the decision, they are,

translation.ja: 決めるのは家族なのよ でも医師の発言に左右される

translation.en: Hi, Mama. Mama?

translation.en: [brother 1] Selena.

translation.en: Hey, sis.

translation.en: You got your brothers here with you. We're here.

translation.en: [brother 2] I know you trying to say something, huh? [brother 3] Yeah, that's all right.
translation.ja: 何か言おうとしてる

translation.en: [brother 2] You trying to say somethin', ain't you?

translation.en: -[brother 3] We love you, Selena. -[brother 2] Yes, we do.

translation.en: [brother 3] We not gonna leave you by yourself.
translation.ja: 孤独にはしない

translation.en: [brother 2] We got ya, baby girl.
translation.ja: ここにいる

translation.en: [brother 4] We just ask that you touch her, Father God.
translation.ja: 神様　彼女に触れてください

translation.en: You know the doctors say one thing, Father God, but we know that you the doctor of doctors, Father God,
translation.ja: 神よ　あなたこそ医師の医師であり―

translation.en: -and the Lord of Lords, Father God. -[brother 3] In Jesus' name.
translation.ja: 王の王であられます

translation.en: [brother 4] In Jesus' name, we pray this prayer. Amen.
translation.ja: イエスの御名において

translation.en: [brothers] Amen.
translation.ja: アーメン

translation.ja: 母は こんな状態だけど―

translation.en: it would feel like murder to pull her life support. That's what it would feel like to me.
translation.ja: 生命維持装置を外すのは私には殺人と同じ

translation.en: We're gonna support you through this. This is -very painful for you and your family. -Absolutely.
translation.ja: ご家族には耐え難いことよね

translation.en: And we're gonna, you know...
translation.ja: 医師も全員―

translation.en: We're all, I mean, everyone hopes for a miracle, I'm hoping for a miracle.
translation.ja: 奇跡が起こるのを願ってる

translation.en: I feel like, maybe as a doctor, being as smart and being as knowledgeable
translation.ja: お医者さんは― 頭がよくて物知りで医学雑誌に載ったりする

translation.en: and being in-- inside of medical journals,
translation.ja: 頭がよくて物知りで医学雑誌に載ったりする

translation.en: you know, it... it can dwindle the optimism a little bit.
translation.ja: でも そのせいで希望を忘れてると思う

translation.en: I'm just trying to help you make a decision that's right for your mom, -Absolutely. -and that's why I want you to be able
translation.ja: これは お母さんにとって最善の判断をする手助けよ

translation.en: to think through this as clearly as you can,
translation.ja: これは お母さんにとって最善の判断をする手助けよ じっくり考え抜いてほしい

translation.en: just thinking about what would my mom have said if the doctors were all saying,
translation.ja: “意識が戻らない”と分かったら― お母さんは何て言うかしら

translation.en: "We don't think she'll wake up."
translation.ja: お母さんは何て言うかしら

translation.en: My mom already made her decision,
translation.ja: 母の答えは出てるわ

translation.en: and that's how come her heart is still beating.

translation.ja: “いつまで”？

translation.ja: “いつまで”か

translation.en: but the machine is providing you some help right now.
translation.ja: 機械の助けがあるからです

translation.ja: もし２ヵ月の我慢で回復すると言えるなら―

translation.en: then most people would probably say, "Sure, sign me up."
translation.ja: 誰もが“やってくれ”と言うでしょう

translation.ja: でも治るかどうか先が見えない状況では―

translation.en: -that's a harder decision to make. -[grunts softly]

translation.en: We can all tell you've been strugglin'.

translation.en: What do you wanna do? Okay?

translation.en: But if, for some reason, you can't breathe...

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: I trust you, okay?

translation.en: Things happen.
